mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into cs_repairs (process_user_id, process_user_name, terminal_id, status, repair_price, pay_types, receive_address_id, customer_id, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, return_address_id, description) values (#{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{repairPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payTypes,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{receiveAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cs_repairs set process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_name = #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, repair_price = #{repairPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_types = #{payTypes,jdbcType=TINYINT}, receive_address_id = #{receiveAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_num = #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_address_id = #{returnAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, terminal_id, status, repair_price, pay_types, receive_address_id, customer_id, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, return_address_id, description from cs_repairs where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, terminal_id, status, repair_price, pay_types, receive_address_id, customer_id, created_at, updated_at, apply_num, return_address_id, description from cs_repairs
mapper.sql: select cr.*, t.id t_id, t.serial_num t_serial_num, m.id m_id, m.title m_title, m.phone m_phone, pc.id pc_id, pc.name pc_name, g.id g_id, g.title g_title, addr.id addr_id, addr.address addr_address from cs_repairs cr left join terminals t on cr.terminal_id=t.id left join goods g on t.good_id=g.id left join pay_channels pc on pc.id=t.pay_channel_id left join merchants m on m.id=t.merchant_id left join cs_receiver_addresses addr on addr.id=cr.receive_address_id
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as count FROM cs_repairs cr
order by cr.process_user_id = #{customerId} desc, cr.created_at desc limit #{pageRequest.offset}, #{pageRequest.pageSize}
mapper.update: update cs_repairs set process_user_id = #{customerId}, process_user_name = #{customerName} where id in #{item}
